canon_sources_index.description: Clean JSON index of all canonical wisdom traditions for governor selection

enochian_magic.name: Enochian Magic - Complete System
enochian_magic.description: The most complete system of angelic communication ever recorded. The angels taught that their language operates on vibrational frequencies that directly restructure reality through hierarchical cooperation with celestial intelligences.
core_principles: Divine language as reality-manipulation tool
Hierarchical cooperation with angelic intelligences
Vibrational magic through sacred pronunciation
Geographic and spiritual governance through the 91 Governors
key_systems: 48 Enochian Keys - Reality-altering invocations in angelic language
Great Table - 49x49 grid containing all magical correspondences
30 Aethyrs - Ascending levels of spiritual reality
Watchtowers - Elemental magical squares for each direction

hermetic_tradition.name: Hermetic Tradition - Complete Philosophy
hermetic_tradition.description: Hermeticism teaches that all existence operates through sympathetic connections between different levels of reality. The fundamental principle 'As Above, So Below' reveals that the microcosm perfectly reflects the macrocosm.
core_principles: Correspondence - All levels of reality mirror each other
Mentalism - The universe is mental in nature, responsive to consciousness
Vibration - Everything vibrates at specific frequencies
Polarity - All truths are half-truths; all paradoxes may be reconciled
Rhythm - Everything flows in cycles and patterns
Causation - Every cause has an effect; every effect has a cause
Gender - Everything contains both masculine and feminine principles
key_systems: Planetary Magic - Working with the seven classical planets
Elemental Magic - Fire, Water, Air, Earth correspondences
Alchemical Transformation - Spiritual and material transmutation
Talismanic Magic - Creating charged objects through timing

golden_dawn.name: Golden Dawn System - Complete Magical Framework
golden_dawn.description: The Golden Dawn synthesized all major Western magical traditions into a coherent system of practical magic. They systematized correspondences between Kabbalah, Tarot, astrology, Enochian magic, and Egyptian mysteries.
core_principles: Kabalistic Tree of Life as map of consciousness and cosmos
Tarot Correspondences - 78 cards mapped to Hebrew letters and paths
Elemental Magic - Complete pentagram and hexagram rituals
Enochian Watchtowers - Systematized angelic magic
Egyptian Godforms - Using deities for magical transformation
key_systems: LBRP - Lesser Banishing Ritual of the Pentagram
Middle Pillar - Energy cultivation and chakra work
Pathworking - Guided meditation through Tree of Life
Skrying - Vision questing in the spirit vision
Invocation and Evocation - Calling divine forces

thelema.name: Aleister Crowley & Thelema - Complete System
thelema.description: Thelema proclaims 'Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.' This represents the discovery and execution of one's True Will - the deepest authentic purpose of existence.
core_principles: True Will - Every individual has a unique cosmic purpose
Love Under Will - All actions should align with authentic nature
Class A Documents - Received texts that carry supreme authority
Aeon of Horus - Current magical age emphasizing individual sovereignty
Knowledge and Conversation - Union with Holy Guardian Angel
key_systems: Liber Resh - Daily solar adorations marking sun's journey
Star Ruby/Star Sapphire - Advanced banishing and invoking rituals
Gnostic Mass - Central religious ceremony of Thelema
Vision and the Voice - Enochian Aethyr exploration
Book of Thoth - Tarot system expressing Thelemic philosophy

kabbalah.name: Kabbalah & Tree of Life - Complete System
kabbalah.description: Kabbalah teaches that the universe emanates from the divine source through ten sefirot arranged on the Tree of Life. Reality consists of four interconnected worlds connected by 22 pathways of consciousness.
core_principles: Ein Sof - The infinite divine source beyond comprehension
Ten Sefirot - Divine attributes reflecting in consciousness
Four Worlds - Levels of reality from divine to physical
22 Paths - Connections between sefirot representing consciousness states
Gematria - Numerical analysis revealing hidden meanings
key_systems: Pathworking - Meditative journeys between sefirot
Gematria - Numerical analysis of Hebrew words
Divine Names - Sacred Hebrew formulas for each sefirah
Tetragrammaton - The four-letter name of God
Sefirot Meditation - Direct experience of divine attributes

egyptian_magic.name: Ancient Egyptian Magic - Complete System
egyptian_magic.description: Egyptian magic views the cosmos as a divine order (Ma'at) maintained through proper ritual and moral alignment. Magic works through correspondence with cosmic cycles and divine names.
core_principles: Ma'at - Cosmic order, truth, and justice
Neteru - Divine principles manifesting as gods and goddesses
Heka - The divine force that powers magic
Ka - Vital life force, spiritual double
Ba - Personality, consciousness that survives death
Akh - Transfigured spirit, enlightened being
key_systems: Solar Worship - Daily adorations following Ra's journey
Mummification Rites - Preservation for spiritual immortality
Canopic Magic - Working with four sons of Horus
Amulet Creation - Sacred symbols for protection
Temple Rituals - Elaborate ceremonies maintaining cosmic order

gnostic_traditions.name: Gnostic Traditions - Complete Library
gnostic_traditions.description: Gnosticism teaches that humans contain a divine spark trapped in material existence. Salvation comes through gnosis (direct knowledge) of one's true divine nature and the cosmic structure keeping souls imprisoned.
core_principles: Divine Spark - Each soul contains fragment of the Pleroma
Demiurge - False creator god who traps souls in matter
Gnosis - Direct experiential knowledge of divine truth
Pleroma - Fullness of divine realm beyond material world
Aeons - Divine emanations from the ultimate source
Sophia - Divine wisdom that fell into matter
key_systems: Contemplative Practice - Direct mystical experience
Sacred Texts Study - Hidden meanings in scripture
Ritual Awakening - Ceremonies to activate divine spark
Mythological Understanding - Cosmic drama of soul's journey
Ascension Practices - Methods for return to Pleroma

chaos_magic.name: Chaos Magic - Reality Hacking System
chaos_magic.description: Chaos magic emphasizes results over belief systems. Practitioners adopt whatever paradigm or method produces the desired outcome, then discard it for the next working. Reality is seen as malleable and responsive to focused will.
core_principles: Paradigm Shifting - Adopting belief systems as tools
Results-Based Practice - Focus on what works rather than theory
Gnosis States - Altered consciousness for magical working
Sigil Magic - Encoding desires into symbolic form
Servitor Creation - Building thoughtforms for specific tasks
Reality Hacking - Exploiting glitches in consensus reality
key_systems: Sigil Creation - Austin Osman Spare's method of desire encoding
Paradigm Adoption - Temporary belief system utilization
Gnosis Induction - Achieving altered states for magic
Servitor/Egregore Work - Creating artificial spirits
Discordian Techniques - Using humor and randomness

norse_traditions.name: Norse & Runic Traditions - Complete System
norse_traditions.description: Norse spirituality centers on concepts of wyrd (fate), honor, and cyclical time. Runes serve as both alphabet and divination system, encoding cosmic principles and magical formulas. The Nine Worlds provide a complete cosmological framework.
core_principles: Wyrd - Web of fate connecting all actions and consequences
Honor - Personal reputation and integrity as highest values
Ragnarok - Cyclical destruction and renewal of cosmos
Nine Worlds - Complete cosmological map via Yggdrasil
Galdr - Vocal magic through runic formulas
Seidr - Shamanic practices and spirit work
key_systems: Runic Divination - Using Elder Futhark for guidance
Galdr Practice - Chanting runic formulas for magic
Blót Rituals - Offering ceremonies to gods and spirits
Utiseta - Sitting out for vision and spirit contact
Wyrd Working - Understanding and influencing fate patterns

tarot_system.name: Tarot - Complete Divination System
tarot_system.description: Tarot represents the soul's journey from innocence (The Fool) through life's experiences to enlightenment (The World). The 78 cards map psychological states, spiritual principles, and cosmic forces.
core_principles: Major Arcana - 22 cards representing major life themes
Minor Arcana - 56 cards for daily situations and elements
Fool's Journey - Progressive spiritual development path
Elemental Correspondences - Suits aligned with Fire/Water/Air/Earth
Astrological Associations - Cards linked to zodiac and planets
Kabbalistic Tree - Cards mapped to Hebrew letters and paths
key_systems: Celtic Cross Spread - Traditional 10-card reading method
Daily Card Draw - Single card for daily guidance
Pathworking - Meditative journeys with card imagery
Elemental Readings - Focusing on specific life areas
Court Card Psychology - Personality archetypes and development

sufi_mysticism.name: Sufi Mysticism - Complete Path
sufi_mysticism.description: Sufism pursues fana (annihilation of the ego in divine love) through dhikr (remembrance), sama (spiritual music), and complete surrender to Allah. The path involves purifying the heart through guided stages.
core_principles: Fana - Passing away of the ego in divine love
Baqa - Subsistence in God after fana
Dhikr - Remembrance of Allah through sacred repetition
Halal - Temporary spiritual state
Maqam - Permanent spiritual attainment
Tariqah - Sufi order or spiritual path
key_systems: Sohbet - Spiritual conversation and teaching
Sama - Sacred music and dance for spiritual ecstasy
Muraqaba - Meditation and contemplation
Breath Work - Sacred breathing techniques
Service - Serving others as worship of the divine

celtic_druidic.name: Celtic & Druidic Traditions - Complete System
celtic_druidic.description: Celtic spirituality emphasizes connection with the land, seasonal cycles, and the Otherworld. Druids served as priests, judges, and keepers of wisdom. Magic works through understanding the sacred in nature.
core_principles: Awen - Divine inspiration, creative flow
Otherworld - Parallel realm of spirits and deities
Ley Lines - Sacred pathways of earth energy
Sacred Groves - Natural temples for worship and ritual
Seasonal Festivals - Eight celebrations marking wheel of year
Tree Wisdom - Each tree species holding specific knowledge
key_systems: Ogham Divination - Celtic tree alphabet for guidance
Seasonal Celebrations - Solstices, equinoxes, and cross-quarters
Land Working - Connecting with spirits of place
Bardic Arts - Poetry, music, and storytelling
Herb Craft - Plant medicine and earth healing

sacred_geometry.name: Sacred Geometry & Mathematics - Complete System
sacred_geometry.description: Sacred geometry reveals mathematical principles underlying creation. Geometric forms like the Flower of Life, Platonic solids, and Golden Ratio appear throughout nature, suggesting divine mathematical order.
core_principles: Golden Ratio - Divine proportion found throughout nature
Flower of Life - Overlapping circles generating all forms
Platonic Solids - Five perfect three-dimensional forms
Vesica Piscis - Sacred intersection representing unity/duality
Fibonacci Sequence - Spiral patterns in natural growth
Sacred Architecture - Buildings designed on geometric principles
key_systems: Temple Design - Sacred architecture using geometric proportions
Mandala Creation - Circular designs for meditation focus
Sigil Construction - Magical symbols based on geometry
Crystal Studies - Understanding geometric mineral structures
Crop Circle Analysis - Decoding geometric message patterns

classical_philosophy.name: Classical Philosophy & Science - Complete Systems
classical_philosophy.description: Greek philosophy established rational inquiry into reality, ethics, and human purpose. Provides frameworks through Platonic Forms, Aristotelian logic, Pythagorean mathematics, and Stoic virtue ethics.
core_principles: Platonic Forms - Eternal perfect templates for material reality
Aristotelian Logic - Rational categories and golden mean
Pythagorean Mathematics - Number as basis of cosmic harmony
Stoic Virtue - Excellence as the only true good
Logos - Divine reason governing the cosmos
Nous - Divine mind or supreme intelligence
key_systems: Socratic Method - Questioning to discover truth
Platonic Dialectic - Reasoning toward eternal truths
Aristotelian Categories - Logical classification systems
Pythagorean Number Work - Mathematics as divine science
Stoic Practice - Daily virtue cultivation and acceptance
